[quote=“youdunce2, post:1, topic:384194”]Ok so when my co owner yells i want it to say co-owner right now it says owner, what do i need to add to this

c2.sendMessage("<shad=4>[Co-Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); }else if (c.playerRights == 2){[/quote]

if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase"OWNER’S NAME HERE") {
THE NORMAL YELL METHOD
}ELSE{
if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase"CO-OWNER’S NAME HERE") {

c2.sendMessage("<shad=4>[Owner]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
